about_the_game:
A gang of cute interdimensional kittens has invaded Venice. The city instantly emptied of its inhabitants, leaving their belongings behind. You're sent to Venice, to find the hundreds of cute kittens hidden in the city and send them back to the world of Woolen Pelota.

DESCRIPTION

Hidden Cats Invade Venice is a 3D Hidden Objects Game, with extremely simple and accessible controls.
The aim is to find all the cats hidden in the environment of each game mode.
Search for your favorite furballs in a sumptuously detailed setting across 9 different levels.
An accessible game for all ages.

A casual, cosy, zen and relaxing game, with no stopwatch or penalty.

CONTENT

  • 4 different game modes
  • Find 600 hidden kittens spread over 9 levels
  • 4 Secret Penguins
  • Mouse or Gamepad control

FEATURES

  • A beautiful city, rich in detail
  • Cute sounds and animations
  • Cats with 4 different colors, multiple postures and several animations
  • No punishment, relaxing and fun.

ACCESSIBILITY

  • Simple and intuitive controls
  • Drag and zoom the screen view
  • Accessible to everyone, there is no text
  • Audio hints to help finding cats on screen

SETTINGS

  • The game will automatically save the progression
  • Configuration settings (sound volume, brightness, sensitivity, graphics quality, display mode, screen edge scrolling)
  • Reset progress entirely and play again

STEAM COMPATIBILITY

  • 9 Steam achievements
  • Steam Cloud Save

GAME MODES

The 4 game modes are directly accessible

360° view
In the heart of the city, observe the streets and squares on a human scale, from an intersection of canals.

Tower view
Turn around a huge tower of dwellings and terraces, and observe it from its full height. And don't forget to take a look around.

Aerial view
Glide over the city, zooming in on rooftops and alleyways to discover hidden cats.

Side view
Observe a set of facades and play with perspective, to find cats in unlikely angles.

name: Hidden Cats Invade Venice

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 3rd gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5, 7th gen (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 970 / AMD Radeon 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Hidden Cats Invade Venice is a hidden object game, where you have to find 600 cute little kittens hidden in the magnificent city of Venice in 3D. A peaceful, colorful game for all ages.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
